DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of hypercapnia on hemodynamics and cerebral oxygenation during shoulder arthroscopy.
DOC.detailed_description: The patients are randomly allocated to receive normocapnia or hypercapnia . After the 70ยบ sitting position, record the mean arterial pressure (MAP), heart rate, and regional oxygen saturation (rSO2).
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing elective shoulder arthroscopic surgery a history of age > 65 years, morbidly obesity (BMI > 30 kg/m2), diffuse lung disease, uncontrolled systemic hypertension, intracranial disease, cardiovascular and cerebrovascular disease.
